Package model

Interface User

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserImpl
public interface User
This interface is the model of user. Here we implement create and load portfolios. As user has a portfolio, it calls an object of portfolio and is able to access its methods.

    checkPortfolioExists(String pName)

  • Method Details

    • createPortfolio

      void createPortfolio(String portfolioName, Map<String,Integer> stocks) throws IllegalArgumentException
      This function generates the portfolio of the user in form of a xml file.
      Parameters:
      portfolioName - the name of portfolio.
      stocks - a map consisting of ticker symbol and quantity.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if there is some error in writing to a xml file.

    • getPortfolioComposition

      StringBuilder getPortfolioComposition(String pName)
      This function gives the composition of portfolio in terms of portfolio name, stock ticker and it's quantity.
      Parameters:
      pName - name of the portfolio
      Returns:
      the composition of portfolio as stated above.

    • loadPortfolio

      String loadPortfolio(String pfName) throws IllegalArgumentException
      This function is used to load the portfolio(xml file) and read its content.
      Parameters:
      pfName - the file name or file path which needs to e loaded.
      Returns:
      the message whether the portfolio got loaded successfully or not.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the file has a wrong format or is unable to read the file.

    • isValidFormat

      boolean isValidFormat(String value)
      This function checks if the date is in correct format (yyyy-MM-dd).
      Parameters:
      value - the date which needs to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the date is in correct format and false otherwise.

    • getTotalValuation

      StringBuilder getTotalValuation(String date, String pName)
      This function gets the total value of entire portfolio on a particular date. It has a portfolio object and calls its function inside.
      Parameters:
      date - the date at which you need to find value of portfolio.
      pName - the name of the portfolio.
      Returns:
      the total valuation of portfolio on inputted date.

    • ifStocksExist

      boolean ifStocksExist(String ticker)
      This function checks if the ticker is valid or not. It checks if the ticker is defined in the enum.
      Parameters:
      ticker - the ticker which need to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the ticker is present in the enum and false otherwise.

    • getName

      String getName()
      This function is used to get the name of the user.
      Returns:
      the name of the user.

    • setName

      void setName(String name)
      This function is used to set the name of the user.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of user which needs to be set.

    • getPortfoliosName

      StringBuilder getPortfoliosName()
      This function returns the names of all the portfolios of a particular user.
      Returns:
      the names of all the portfolios of a particular user.

    • checkPortfolioExists

      boolean checkPortfolioExists(String pName)
      This function checks if a portfolio with the given name already exists or not.
      Parameters:
      pName - the name of portfolio which you need to check.
      Returns:
      true if the portfolio exists and false otherwise.
